title: [Feature Request] Dynamic Connection Folder
author: mhudrlik
body_snippet:
## Expected Behavior
A folder would either automatically or manually  update the list of connections in the folder.  Active Directory and/or REST

## Current Behavior
You can manually import via file, AD or Portscan.

## Possible Solution
A flag on the folder with a setting in minutes/hours/days of how frequently to update the list, possibly by just calling the import function and overwriting the contents of the folder.  It would be nice to be able to right click and update manually as we...

iterations.description: The issue proposes a broad dynamic-folder concept but does not provide concrete, testable requirements or validated behavior on current builds.

comments.author: mhudrlik

I apologize for the delay in response, I finally got around to testing out SQL for connections.  It will let me modify and keep up to date connections in SQL, or I could periodically update the SQL DB with info from AD.

Ideally I think it would be beneficial to have an option to just import over the top of the existing folder, kind of like a dynamic folder (updating every x minutes) containing connections to a specific OU.
